name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.elapsedTime

content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The elapsedTime read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the elapsed time in seconds after theSpeechSynthesisUtterance.text started being spoken that the event was triggered at.
